author: Johnny Harris
description:
American elections are for sale. It wasn’t always this way.
Get 40% off Ground News’ unlimited access Vantage Plan at https://ground.news/johnnyharris for only $5/month, explore how stories are framed worldwide and across the political spectrum.

Join the Newpress waitlist here: https://newpress.com/

Check out all my sources for this video here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wvj1PVqEgCtehD0G4uzLolw0tGfj2SxNCH5PL1mEqp0/edit?tab=t.0

American elections have more money flowing through them than any other country’s elections, yes adjusted for population, and it isn't even close. How did we get here?

Special thanks to:
- Richard Hasen, UCLA School of Law
- Brad Smith, Institute for Free Speech
- Ann Southworth, UC Irvine School of Law
- Michael Beckel, Issue One
- Heather Ferguson, Common Cause
- Ray La Raja, University of Massachusetts
- Patrick Llewellyn, Campaign Legal Center
- Andrew Mayersohn, OpenSecrets

title: How billionaires stole America's elections
